imdb_user_reviews.contents: Slow moving but completely worth it!

Excellent choice......if you're having trouble sleeping at night.
You'll be disappointed even though you start it with low expectation.
A perfect storm of a movie, so take shelter and watch this film.
Great movie, great acting Michael Shannon.
A haunting look at our future, and present
This is a leisurely paced film that tests our patience but its rewards are invaluable
there's nothing to rave about this film
Created an atmosphere more intense than any film I have ever watched
Overrated one act copy of similar big budget flick

Tense. A simple focused film done right.
The first film of 2011 that I was fully invested in!

The ending ruins the whole movie
Don't take shelter from this one! You might regret it

A slow burner... But worth it!...
Michael Shannon deals with depression, fear, and all-out paranoia in Jeff Nichols' reality-bending Take Shelter.
Well,  first Shannon and Nichols movie I have watched and I loved it!

Not enjoyable at all for me.
